Player History
Injured on 8/2/1978 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/21/1979, off Scott Wiltshire (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/24/1979, off Pedro Segarra (Min)...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1983, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1983...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/1/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $4,178,900 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Gashouse on 4/25/1986...
Injured on 8/18/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/3/1988 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/3/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
